scripts.layer:set: cp ./package.json lib/package.json && cd lib && npm install --production --ignore-scripts --no-package-lock
scripts.layer:make: rimraf nodejs && mkdir nodejs && mkdir nodejs/node_modules && mkdir nodejs/node_modules/omni-utils && cp -r ./lib nodejs/node_modules/omni-utils
scripts.layer:create: npm run layer:clean && npm run layer:set && npm run layer:make && npm run layer:zip
